services.title: Web Design

aboutpara: Iâ€™m a Frontend Developer with experience in frontend development, web design, and WordPress. Iâ€™ve helped businesses build modern web experiences with technologies like React, Next.js, and Shopify.

resume.description: I'm James Guevara Gamboa, a web developer specializing in frontend development and web design. I hold a Technician degree in Web Design and Development from CETAV and have worked on projects like Audiophile (e-commerce) and Travel Haven (Airbnb clone). My expertise includes JavaScript, React, Next.js, SEO optimization, and WordPress customization. I'm passionate about crafting effective and engaging digital solutions.
